data.title: Military Discounts On Glasses & Sunglasses
data.meta_description: If you wear glasses or love sunglasses, you will want to check out this list of places with a military discount on eyeglasses and sunglasses.
data.text:
Julie Provost

Eyeglasses and Sunglasses Discounts for Military & Veterans

If you need to wear glasses, or just love your sunglasses, you will also want to find a place to buy them with a military discount. The good news is, there are quite a few companies to choose from. Here is a list of places to get a military discount on your eyeglasses and sunglasses.

AFEyewear.com

AFEeyewear.com is now a part of FrameDirect.com and offers military discount sunglasses by Ray-Ban and Oakley Military Discount Sunglasses. They offer discounts to military retirees, reservists, and veterans. There’s free standard shipping, and exclusive pricing and you can find eyeglasses, sunglasses, and contact lenses at their store.

Discount Contact Lens (formerly AC Lens)

AC Lens has become Discount Contacts. This company no longer sells eyewear not related to contact lenses or eyecare. There is a 20% veteran discount advertised on the official site, verify using ID.me.

EyeBuyDirect

Through EyeBuyDirect you can find eyeglasses and sunglasses. They have a veteran discount of 20% off with a code. This discount is good for all eyeglasses frames and lenses.

Eyemart Express

Eyemart Express offers eyeglasses and sunglasses. It offers a 20% military discount for retired, active, and non-active military personnel, veterans, and dependents. Show your military ID to claim the discount.

Gatorz Eyewear

At Gatorz Eyewear you can find sunglasses in a larger size, which is the preferred style of military and law enforcement personnel. Gatorz offers a discount code for active, retired, and veteran military members. You must be verified to receive a discount code. You can not use it on prescription or lens replacement orders. It also can’t be combined with any other discounts or offers on pre-orders or certain limited-edition products.

GlassesUSA.com

At GlassesUSA.com you can find eyeglasses and sunglasses with a $10 off military discount “super coupon.”

Oakley

At Oakley, there’s a program called Oakley Standard Issue. With the program, they offer ballistic-rated and uniform-approved eye protection, elite product releases unavailable to civilians, free membership, and savings using discounts through ID.me.

SmartBuyGlasses

At SmartBuyGlasses, you can find sunglasses, eyeglasses, and contact lenses. They have a 10% military discount on all of their products. Verify your military status and you’ll be emailed a discount code.

Sunglass Hut

At Sunglass Hut, there’s a 15% military discount for active duty, retirees, veterans, military spouses, and military family members. Verify with ID.me on the shopping cart page. You can’t combine it with other promotional codes and some brands are excluded.

Zenni Optical

At Zenni Optical, you can find eyeglasses and sunglasses for men, women, and kids. Zenno Optical offers a 10% off military discount to active duty military, veterans, reservists, and military spouses, verified by ID.me. It can’t be combined with other offers.
